name: Trial by Fire (CarebearDrew, Benilde GameDev, Rappy_, HaruTakigawa, Expellon)
name_original: Trial by Fire (CarebearDrew, Benilde GameDev, Rappy_, HaruTakigawa, Expellon)
description: Trial by Fire is a game where you take on the role of a Citizen trapped inside a sudden fire in your condominium. You must hurry and get out before the fire gets to strong trapping you inside of it.
